+            "Expected " << it->lhs << " " << (it->cmp < 0 ? "<" : ">") << " " << it->rhs;
+        EXPECT_EQ(cmp(it->rhs, it->lhs), it->cmp > 0) <<
+            "Expected " << it->rhs << " " << (it->cmp > 0 ? "<" : ">") << " " << it->lhs;
